author: kaletsop
title: DAOLaunch: Decentralized VC NFTs
description: The startup investment industry is largely led by big institutional investors and retail investors are left out of great inv. opportunities.
solution: Our solution at DAOLaunch is to create an open and inclusive competitive environment - the Decentralized Venture Capital concept.
experience: DAOLaunch's team has been involved in crypto since 2015 with extensive knowledge in investment, development, marketing and management.
